You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALESFORCE.ORG GENERAL PRODUCT DOCUMENTATION
Access Pro Bono Opportunities

Explore pro bono opportunities on the Impact Exchange platform, access expert advice via Quick Connect calls, and create and plan for your project.

Getting Started on Impact Exchange
This article is designed to help you get started on the Impact Exchange platform. It reviews how the platform works, project eligibility, and how to get started when you first log in.
Setting Up A New Project on Impact Exchange
This article is designed to help you as you prepare to create your first project on the Impact Exchange. This includes choosing a project type, creating your project draft, and publishing it when you’re ready to start recruiting volunteers.
How to Choose the Right Volunteer on Impact Exchange
This article will walk you through the process of evaluating and accepting volunteer applicants so you can choose the best volunteer for your project.
Managing Your Project on Impact Exchange
This article can be used as a guideline on how you can find helpful resources, track the progress made over the course of the project, and successfully close out the project once it is completed on the Impact Exchange.
Quick Connect Project Advice Guide
This article is designed to help Impact Exchange Volunteers guide the conversation during a Quick Connect - Project Advice call. It includes helpful tips and example questions that you can discuss to better understand and articulate the project requirements. When drafting the final project description, you want to end up with a clearly defined set of deliverables and required skills.
How to Create a Pro Bono Project Scope of Work
A clear and specific project scope is crucial for clarifying your priorities, creating alignment across project stakeholders, and recruiting the right volunteer.
Defining Your Pro Bono Volunteer's Role
This document highlights the different volunteer “roles” and provide guidance on how to best identify, recruit, and engage with potential pro bono volunteers.
Security Best Practices With Pro Bono Volunteers
Tips for keeping your data safe and secure when working with a pro bono volunteer.
Additional Pro Bono Resources
Need pro bono services? Check out this list of organizations that specialize in matching professionals with nonprofits, NGOs, and educational institutions in need of technology, marketing, human resources, and other expertise.
DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
Let us know so we can improve!

title: Pro Bono Project Setup and Management
